3D Contour Properties

Requires: Full Development System

Property Description
Plot Specific:Active Plot Gets or sets the active plot. Details
Plot Specific:General:Plot Name Configures the text of the plot name. Details
Plot Specific:General:Plot Opacity Specifies the level of opacity of the color you apply to the plot. Details
Plot Specific:General:Coordinates System Configures the coordinate system to display the 3D plot. Details
Plot Specific:Projection:Draw XY Projection Displays the plot projection on the XY plane. Details
Plot Specific:Projection:Draw XZ Projection Displays the plot projection on the XZ plane. Details
Plot Specific:Projection:Draw YZ Projection Displays the plot projection on the YZ plane. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Color Ramp Sets the color map for the ramp. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Line Style Specifies the style of the contour lines. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Line Width Specifies the width of the contour lines. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Line Color Sets the color of the contour lines. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Line Anti-aliasing Uses anti-aliasing to show the contour lines. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Mode Sets the display mode of the contour. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Axis Basis Sets the axis to draw the contour. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Level List Configures the values of the user-defined contour line. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Level Mode Sets the level mode of the contour lines. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Levels Configures the number of contour lines. Details
Plot Specific:Contour:Contour Interval Configures the interval between the contour lines. Details
